page.title: 17RECREATION - Orienteering.
page.content: The Chase is used by local schools and Walton Chasers for this sport which has become popular in the last 10 years. Competitors have to find their way around a course that is marked on their map.At different points they have to find a flag.Each flag has a different number or letter.The competitors have a sheet that tells them the code of the flag they are looking for.There is a punch near each flag with metal spikes in a pattern for that flag alone.On finding a flag the competitor punches his card and when all the spaces are punched he/she returns to base.A route marked with ribbon is for children. Essential Equipment:(Competitor) --------------------------------------- Red biro-to copy master map. A whistle-for safety if you get lost. A compass-to find way around. (Helen Christopher Age10)
